column6: Massive climatic disturbances are wreaking havoc with the planet and even the assemblage of the Ultimate U's mightiest is no match for this worldwide destruction! Featuring Spider-Man, the Fantastic Four, the X-Men, the Ultimates, the Hulk and more!
column8: | penciller:David Finch | colorist:STEVE FIRCHOW | colorist:Jason Keith | writer:Jeph Loeb | inker:Danny K. Miki | letterer:Richard Starkings
